title: The One Detail Making Your Ballet Flats Cooler Than Ever
description: These will make your ’fits street style-ready.
excerpt: When looking to upgrade your ballet flats, consider a pair of studded ballet flats. A trendy take on the classic style, shop our favorite styles right now.

html:
Tried & True

Alaïa Leather Mary Jane Flats

By this point, you’ve probably seen Alaïa ballet flats everywhere—and for good reason. The customer-loved shoe is just as popular as ever, so if you’re looking to add some shine to your footwear, you can’t go wrong with the brand’s iconic crystal-studded flats.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Noir, Blanc

Material: Lambskin

Cool Comfort

Madewell The Remy Mary Jane Flat

Madewell is known for the ultra-comfortable foot padding in its shoes, and these crystal-studded Mary Janes are no exception. They would be a great option for work and beyond, as they’re both comfy and chic.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: True Black, Ruby Port, Ecru

Material: Leather

Customer review: “I’ve been wanting a new pair of go-to flats, and these are perfect! They are super comfortable”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Beaded Beauty

Jil Sander Studded Leather Ballerina Flats

A beaded flat is the perfect option for those who want an elevated take on a timeless style. Pair these with your favorite jeans to achieve a casual yet stylish look.

Sizes: 6-11

Colors: Black

Material: Leather

Flattering Shape

Reformation Brenna Ballet Flat

Studded ballet flats are surprisingly versatile! A stylish toe shape and jumbo studs add an extra level of detail to these flats, making them anything but basic.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Black W Studs, Cream Puff Leather, Rum Suede

Material: Nappa

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Make It Mesh

Dear Frances Balla Studded Mesh Ballerina Flats

When you combine two ballet flat trends into one, you get a studded mesh flat that you’ll want to wear with everything. The gold studs are the perfect accent for a fashion-forward style.

Sizes: 6-11

Colors: Black

Material: Mesh, Leather

Spring-Ready

Tony Bianco Miami Flat

It may not feel like it right now, but the seasons will eventually change and it will get warmer. When it does, switching to a white studded flat is just the move.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: White, Black Nappa

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sophisticated Studs

Le Monde Béryl Regency Studded Leather Ballet Flats

This is a pair of studded flats that screams sophistication. You simply can’t go wrong with shoes that feel classic and cool like these.

Sizes: 6-12

Colors: Black

Material: Leather

Dainty & Darling

AEYDE Uma Mini Studs Flats

If larger studs feel too intimidating for you, try this pair from Aeyde. The smaller, daintier beaded studs and square toe set these apart from the rest in your closet.

Sizes: 5-11.5

Colors: Black

Material: Goatskin

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Keep It Classic

Loeffler Randall Landon Soft Ballet Flats

Still want a more feminine look? I have the shoes for you. With the small bow on the top, this ballet flat gets as classic as it gets, but with the addition of metallic studs, they instantly become a little cooler (and dressier).

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Black/Silver

Material: Lambskin

Cool Girl-Approved

Tory Burch Studded Ballet Flat

If you happen to be in the market for a showstopping pair of shoes, these all-over studded flats should be on your radar. They’re the ultimate cool-girl shoe you never knew you needed.

Sizes: 5-10.5

Colors: Perfect Black

Material: Napa Leather

Customer review: “Not only are these shoes so fantastically beautiful, they are also really comfortable which rarely ever happens. I absolutely love them!!!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Mixed Metals

Jeffrey Campbell Summer Holiday Mary Janes

The mixed metal grommets on these flats will add a little something extra to your outfit. In other words, it’s a studded flat unlike any other.

Sizes: 6-10

Colors: White, Black Gold Silver, Red Gold Silver, Light Brown Suede

Material: Leather

Customer review: “Such a cute shoe! It’s super versatile and effortless! Perfect piece to elevate any simple outfit. I need them to come in different colors.”

New Go-To

Dolce Vita Reyes Stud Ballet Flats

With a square toe and simple buckle, these studded gems from Dolce Vita will quickly become your new favorite flats. The studs aren’t overpowering or too shiny, making the pair a versatile option in your wardrobe.

Sizes: 5.5-11

Colors: Black Leather

Material: Leather

Customer review: “Cute shoe … the leather is soft and comfortable!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Glove Shoe

Mango Studded Leather Shoes

For a different take, try a pair with large studs and more of a glove-like flat. Wear them with wide-leg or barrel jeans for a seamless and easy look.

Sizes: 6-9.5

Colors: Black

Material: Goatskin

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
